authors.author: Fanny Jane Crosby Phoebe Palmer Knapp

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
This is my story
this is my song,

Praising my Savior
all the day long.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines: Oh, what a foretaste of glory divine!

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Heir of salvation,
purchase of God,

Born of His Spirit,
washed in His blood!

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines: Visions of rapture now burst at my sight!

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Echoes of mercy,
whispers of love.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Perfect submission,
all is at rest.

I in my Savior
am happy and blest;

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Filled with His goodness,
lost in His love.
